title: Image upload and metadata extraction success
description: Verify that users can upload images successfully and the AI extracts and displays accurate metadata.

steps.description: Navigate to the Image Extraction page
Upload a valid image file using the upload control
Check that the image is accepted and display confirms upload
Verify AI metadata extraction completes with accurate metadata displayed

title: Image upload rejects unsupported file types
description: Ensure that unsupported file types are rejected during image upload with an appropriate error notification.

steps.description: Navigate to the Image Extraction page
Attempt to upload an unsupported file type (e.g., .txt, .pdf)
Check that the upload is rejected
Verify an error toast notification appears explaining the invalid file type

title: Generate tabular data with valid headers and types
description: Validate that users can create tabular data by inputting valid headers and types and the AI generates corresponding data correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Data Generator page
Input a valid set of headers with respective data types
Trigger AI-based data generation
Verify that generated tabular data matches specified headers and types

title: Data Generator handles empty or invalid headers input
description: Confirm that the system handles empty header inputs or invalid headers gracefully with validation errors and feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to the Data Generator page
Leave headers empty or input invalid header names
Attempt to generate data
Check form validation errors appear for required headers or invalid inputs
Verify no data generation attempt is made

title: API Mapper field mapping and data transformation
description: Verify that users can select source and target APIs and successfully map and transform data fields using the interactive UI controls.

steps.description: Navigate to the API Mapper page
Select a valid source API from the dropdown
Select a valid target API from the dropdown
Map source fields to target fields using the provided UI controls
Trigger data transformation
Verify that the transformed data matches expected output based on mapping

title: API Mapper invalid mapping error handling
description: Ensure the API Mapper handles incomplete or invalid field mapping gracefully with error messages and prevents flawed transformations.

steps.description: Navigate to the API Mapper page
Select source and target APIs
Leave required field mappings incomplete or invalid
Attempt to transform data
Verify error messages are shown indicating incomplete or invalid mappings
Check that data transformation does not proceed

title: Responsive Navbar functionality with mobile toggle
description: Test that the top navigation bar using shadcn UI components is responsive and toggles correctly on mobile devices.

steps.description: Access the application on desktop browser and verify Navbar is visible with all menu items
Resize the browser to mobile viewport size or use a mobile device
Verify Navbar collapses into a toggle menu
Click the mobile toggle button
Check that menu items become visible when toggled

title: Toast notifications for success, error, and feedback
description: Verify that toast notifications appear timely and convey appropriate messages for operation successes, failures, and system feedback.

steps.description: Trigger a successful operation e.g., image upload or data generation
Check that a success toast notification appears with correct message
Trigger an operation that results in error e.g., invalid file upload or invalid data mapping
Verify error toast notification appears with informative error message
Trigger system feedback notifications such as performance status or theme change
Verify informational toast notifications appear accordingly

title: Performance monitoring records operation durations accurately
description: Check that the zustand store and timing helpers correctly capture and log operation durations for key interactions like AI calls and data transformations.

steps.description: Perform operations such as image metadata extraction, data generation, and API data mapping
Verify performance metrics are recorded in zustand store
Check that operation durations correspond reasonably to real elapsed times

title: Theme toggle and UI styling consistency across devices
description: Ensure that the application theme can be toggled and that TailwindCSS styling is consistent across different browsers and device form factors.

steps.description: Toggle theme settings to switch between available themes
Verify UI styling updates accordingly to reflect theme changes
Access the application on multiple device types and browsers
Check consistent styling and layout using TailwindCSS theme tokens
